about_the_game: The Van Helsing Final Cut: High Resolution Texture Pack changes the normal textures into higher resolution textures in the game. After installation "The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut" game will need at least 6 GB RAM to run smoothly.
detailed_description: The Van Helsing Final Cut: High Resolution Texture Pack changes the normal textures into higher resolution textures in the game. After installation "The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut" game will need at least 6 GB RAM to run smoothly.

fullgame.name: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut

legal_notice: ©2013 Neocoregames Ltd. All Rights Reserved. NeocoreGames and the logo of NeocoreGames, The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing and the logo of The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing are registered trademarks or marks of Neocoregames Ltd.
name: Van Helsing Final Cut: High Resolution Texture Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800, Radeon HD4000, Intel HD4000 (min. 512 MB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows 8 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or Radeon HD5800
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card

short_description: The Van Helsing Final Cut: High Resolution Texture Pack change the normal textures into higher resolution textures in the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Czech, Russian
*languages with full audio support
